text: Log you daily work hours in a plain json file.
Do you want to change the color when you are working and when you are not?
What is the directory where the log files are stored?
How many hours do you work on a day?
How many minutes do you need to have lunch?
Round to the neares quarter? e.g. 15:04 will be stored as 15:00 (and 16:10 -> 16:15)
